item.title: Torre Vado Travel Guide (Lecce (province)/Apulia/Southern Italy/Italy/Europe)
item.description: Discover the hidden gems of Torre Vado, a charming town located in the province of Lecce, in Apulia, Southern Italy. From culturally important attractions to hiking/biking routes and local food & drink scene, explore the best of Torre Vado with this ultimate travel guide.
